function NPC_113069:Init( NPCID ) NPC_113069.BufIdRegen = 82000 NPC_113069.TalIdUnburrow = 211306901 end
function NPC_113069:OnTimer( Index ) --GLog( "OnTimer" .. this:GetMode() .. "\n") if this:GetMode() == 1 then --GLog( "Unburrow\n" )
this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113069.TalIdUnburrow ) end end
function NPC_113069:OnFinishBurrow( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_113069.BufIdRegen ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( 1 , 6 , false ) end
function NPC_113069:OnFinishUnburrow( ThisActor, Enemy ) ThisActor:RemoveBuff( NPC_113069.BufIdRegen ) end
function NPC113069_ProcessAccDamage( HitInfo ) local BongBong = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) if BongBong:GetMode() == 1 and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then --GLog( "BongBong Acc Damage\n" )
--[[ HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_BEATEN, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_KNOCKBACK, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_STUN, 100, 2000 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_THROWUP, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_KNOCKDOWN, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_UPPERED, -100, 0 ) --]]
--_LogHitInfo( HitInfo )
BongBong:RemoveBuff( NPC_113069.BufIdRegen ) BongBong:SetTimer( 2 , 2 , false ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_113069:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC113069_ProcessAccDamage( HitInfo ) end
